name: City Of The Nameless
description:
~THIS IS A WORKING CONCEPT~

Be an adventurer in the city of the nameless. Climb your way up the ranks, Fight beasts, Help villagers and kill epic bosses for some legendary loot! 

In this voice activated game you are the controller. The only thing you need to play this game is to speak clear English.

Please note that this is only a concept preview and the only working section of the game is class selection just to give you guys an idea of how the game plays. If you want the full experience of the game please close your eyes.

This game was created for the 2018 Blind Jam hosted by Aestuo(https://itch.io/jam/blind-jam)

CREDITS:

Developer/Coder: Laurence Schinina

Voice Actor: Mitch Warrick

There is no way to exit the game other then to ALT + F4
